item.title: US-550 North at NM-4
item.description: US-550 north at NM-4 North in San Ysidro.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-4
item.description: US-550 north at NM-4 north to Jemez Pueblo and Jemez Springs. Continue north on US-550 for Cuba.

item.title: US-550 North Approaching NM-4
item.description: US-550 north approaching NM-4. NM-4 is a mountainous road 44 miles north of here and is not advised for trucks.

item.title: NM-4 West at NM-501
item.description: NM-4 west at NM-501 on the west side of Los Alamos.

item.title: Exit of Bandelier National Monument at NM-4
item.description: Exit of Bandelier National Monument at NM-4. Turn left on NM-4 for Valles Caldera National Reserve, and Jemez State Monument. The smaller green sign in the background is a standard kind posted around Los Alamos. Turn left on NM-4 for Los Alamos and Jemez Mountains. Turn right for White Rock and Santa Fe.

item.title: NM-502 East at NM-4
item.description: NM-502 east at NM-4 west to White Rock.

item.title: NM-502 West at NM-4
item.description: NM-502 West at NM-4. Merge right for NM-4/White Rock/Bandelier National Monument. This is the truck route into Los Alamos. Continue ahead for NM-502 west to Los Alamos.
